resources.string: There are no payment methods available.
The payment methods in the current payment session are not supported by this app.
Confirmation may take up to 30 seconds. Don\'t close or click the back button.
Please wait for the payment to process.
There was a problem with your internet connection.
Unfortunately we were unable to continue with your payment request. Maybe it was submitted already or timed out. You could start the payment checkout again.
